Its rugged embedded computing products comprise IoT gateway, single board computers, EAC PRO, M-series and marine EAC box PC, 2U-rack IPC, and DIN rail, as well as ARM, fan less, standard, and full box PCs; vehicle mounted computers include FM07 series, M101BK, FM08, FM10, and FM10Q; and digital signage and bartype products consist of bartype panel PCs and bartype displays. In addition, the company offers healthcare solutions, such as healthcare grade 4K monitors, multi-touch monitors, and mobile solutions. It serves industrial IIoT and edge computing, healthcare, food, beverage and chemical, retail, oil and gas, automotive, warehouse and logistics, marine, military, field services, heavy duty, factory automation, transportation, smart-grid, and public safety industries. WinMate Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3419.TW.summary: Wha Yu Industrial Co., Ltd. provides antenna products for wireless transmission industry primarily in Taiwan and Hong Kong. It offers telecommunication BTS, in building coverage optimization, outdoor coverage optimization, GPS, automotive, Wi-Fi, LTE, DSRC, walkie talkie, various embedded, military, maritime, telematics, mmWave active, handheld game console, small cell, and dispenser antennas, as well as NFC antennas/modules, alarm devices, RFID products, electronic cable assemblies, and BSD blind spot detection radars. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3426.TWO.summary: Tai Shing Electronics Components Corporation manufactures and sells solenoids and solenoid valves under the Sun-Magnet brand. It offers open, tubular, magnet, push pull, rotary, and flapper solenoids, as well as solenoid water, air, and oil valves. The company also provides pump, sensor, and auxiliary power modules; soap dispenser products and related accessories; modularized mechatronics; and electromagnetic suckers, as well as relays under the TTi brand. In addition, it offers solenoid ODM/OEM services. The company serves customers in the water technology, total solution/module, energy (environment), home application, industrial automation, automotive, healthcare devices, sewing machine, security, and IT industries. Tai Shing Electronics Components Corporation was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3429.TWO.summary: Promaster Technology Corp. distributes general purpose, communication and multimedia products for communication and consumer markets. The company's products are used in desktop and server PCs, notebook PCs, smart phones, LCD TVs, PDA, graphic cards, and audio/video I/O products; networking products, such as LAN, ADSL router and cable modems, and telecom products; and wireless products, including cellular phones, wireless handheld devices, WLAN and Bluetooth, and GPS. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3434.TWO.summary: ACULA Technology Corp. provides video solutions and services in Taiwan and internationally. It offers closed-circuit television (CCTV) monitors; combo DVR/NVR products; medical displays; IP monitors with POE; IP public view monitors with POE; industrial monitors-touch monitors/point of sale (POS); digital signage/public information display products; and high-brightness monitors. The company also provides OEM/ODM display products. It offers CCTV products for use in apartment complexes, airports, bars, casinos, daycares, schools, parks, fast food restaurants, hotels, night clubs, parking lots, office buildings, shopping malls, train/bus stations, and warehouses, as well as for home owners; and POS products for food service, hospitality, retail, and public markets. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3437.TW.summary: Advanced Optoelectronic Technology Inc. engages in the research and development of opto-semiconductor technologies, and commercialization of solid-state lighting solutions in Taiwan. It provides chip LEDs for use in cellular phone keypad backlights and various indicator lights; top LEDs for backlighting, automobile, camera flash, and other applications; side emitted LEDs for use in small size panels and slim type panels; and lighting fixtures and UV light chips. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3438.TWO.summary: Advanced Analog Technology, Inc. designs, develops, and sells power management ICs in Taiwan. It provides multifunctional PMICs, such as TFT LCDs, AMOLEDs, DSC/DVs, and portable devices; boost, buck, buck-boost, and inverting switching regulators; WLED drivers consisting of backlights and lighting products; and battery management products comprising battery chargers and battery protection products. The company also offers audio amps, GPMs, LDOs, level shifters, motor drivers, OP amps/buffers, RESETs, and photoflash products. Its products are used in DSC/DV/drive recorder, PND, and discrete and integrated LCD panel applications. Advanced Analog Technology, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

3441.TWO.summary: Unique Optical Industrial Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, processes, and trades in various optical glasses, optical lenses, lens blanks, stubble blanks, and prism blanks in Taiwan and internationally. Its products are used in cameras, camcorders, telescopes, microscopes, condensers, projectors, fax machines, copiers, scanners, monitors, digital cameras, measuring instruments, military observation equipment, medical endoscopes, camera phones, and optical communication products. The company was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Nantou, Taiwan.

3443.TW.summary: Global Unichip Corp. researches, develops, produces, tests, and sells embedded memory, logic, and analog components for various application ICs in Taiwan, China, Europe, Japan, Korea, and North America. The company offers designing, wafer manufacturing, packaging, and testing services for ASIC and wafer products; circuit design cell library and various intellectual properties (IPs) required in the process of product design; circuit layouts for mask making; and subcontract mask making, wafer manufacturing, dicing, and packaging to vendors, as well as conducts testing. It also integrates multiple design projects of various customers on single mask and by a wafer engineer run; and provides customization, consulting, designing, technical support, and IP licensing services, as well as provides cell libraries; and EDA tools. In addition, the company offers system on a chip (SoC) design services, such as technology design, design methodology, low power solution, and testability design services; SoC manufacturing services consisting of packaging, testing and product engineering, and quality and reliability, as well as supply chain management services; and IP portfolio, including synthesizable implementation IP, and hardened PHYs and verification IP for ASIC, FPGA, and SoC designs. Global Unichip Corp. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3444.TWO.summary: Niching Industrial Corporation markets and sells semiconductor, flat panel display, light-emitting diode (LED), green energy, and nanotechnology products worldwide. The company provides PCB for solid-state drives and memory modules, substrates for IC packaging, capillary wedges, die collet needles, special gas, dispensing nozzles, and die attach films, as well as reclaim, Al coating, dummy, and daisy chain wafers. It also offers screen printing silver paste, Nano imprint silver paste, gravure off set silver paste, low-temperature sintering Ag paste, and low temp adhesive silver paste, as well as printing paste for laser etching and silver ink; chip trays, ABS reels, sputtering targets, and emboss spacers for the LCD industry; and LED tabs and lead frames for the LED industry. In addition, the company provides adhesives for temporary bonding, metal springs for VCM, CPD dryers, and Nano porous materials, substrate for stretchable and flexible modules, and wireless power charging coils. Further, it manufactures and sells touch Nano silver products. Niching Industrial Corporation was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

3455.TWO.summary: Utechzone Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and markets automatic optical inspection products in Taiwan. It offers PCB, FPD, and semiconductor inspection services. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3466.TWO.summary: Skardin Industrial Corporation, a consumer electronics manufacturing company, manufactures, supplies, and exports set top box and broadband industry solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers STB platforms, smart home products, WIFI speakers, hybrid soundbase and sound bar audio systems, and software/middleware products. The company also provides electronics manufacturing services. Skardin Industrial Corporation was founded in 1982 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3479.TWO.summary: Avalue Technology Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells embedded computing solutions in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers industrial and embedded motherboards; industrial PC/computers, such as embedded, transportation, rackmount, and ARM based systems; and panel PCs, including industrial, medical, and open frame panel PCs, as well as industrial touch monitors, audio and video extenders, peripherals and accessories, and panel and touch technologies. It also provides computer-on-module products for critical or industrial applications; point of sale (POS) terminals, which includes desktop and compact POS; medical tablets, and semi rugged tablet and accessories; device management software; E ink solutions, such as public display, healthcare IoT, and E ink technologies solutions; ODM services; and intelligent solutions. The company's products are used in healthcare, retail, gaming, manufacturing, and transportation applications. Avalue Technology Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3481.TW.summary: Innolux Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells TFT-LCD panels, modules, and monitors of liquid crystal displays (LCD), color filters, and low temperature poly-silicon TFT-LCDs. It offers TFT-LCD panel modules and open cells for LCDs, billboards, desktop monitors, and notebooks, as well as for small and medium size products that are used to manufacture tablet computers, portable audio players, GPS for automobiles, aviation, smart home, and mobile phones. The company also provides various touch panels, including glass/glass capacitive, glass/film/film capacitive, and one glass capacitive touch panels. In addition, it imports and exports LCD display and electronics parts, as well as provides products for medical, industrial, and educational purposes. Further, the company is involved in the research, development, testing, and maintenance activities; and distribution, general investment, and storage businesses. It operates in Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, Europe, the United States, and internationally. Innolux Corporation has a strategic collaboration with E Ink Holdings Inc. to focus on expanding electronic paper products in IoT and smart city applications. The company was formerly known as Chimei Innolux Corporation and changed its name to Innolux Corporation in December 2012. Innolux Corporation was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3483.TWO.summary: Forcecon Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of thermal management products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers DC axial and blower fans, thermal module active and passive products, vapor chambers, and heat pipes for use in computers, VGA, LED lightings, servers, automobiles, smart-phones, and bio-technology science fields. It serves ODM and OEM customers. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

3490.TWO.summary: Single Well Industrial Corporation designs, produces, and sells molds and auto machines in Taiwan, Japan, and internationally. The company offers semi-conductor and LED molding, IC molding, deflashing, trimming, and forming dies, as well as parts of dies, including overhauling on molding dies. It also provides deflash/trim/singulator auto machines, test products, handlers, tapings, auto loaders, solder dippings, epoxy dispensing products, insert tubes, manu press, and parts. In addition, the company offers package molds, such as resistors/diodes and sim/flash drives; and automated machineries, including photo couplers, high powers, semiconductors, LEDs, and IRMs, as well as engages in solar energy business. It serves manufacturers of electronic parts and semi-conductors. Single Well Industrial Corporation was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3491.TWO.summary: Universal Microwave Technology, Inc. designs, develops, and manufactures custom microwave/mm-wave devices, sub-systems, and antennas for broadband wireless communications. The company's products comprise diplexers, filters, couplers, OMT products, Eband/millimeter-wave products, distributed antenna systems, hanger clamp sets, Ku/Ka band OMT and filter assemblies, waveguide components, circulators/isolators, cable assemblies, flexible waveguides, antennas, die-casting and machined parts, and remote mount kits. Its products are used in point-to-point, cellular, VSAT, WiMAX, and LTE applications. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Keelung City, Taiwan.

3494.TW.summary: HiTi Digital, Inc. manufactures and supplies digital photo products and services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers industrial, commercial, and consumer photo printers; card printers; order station/operation console products; print kit/consumables; and printer accessories. It also provides professional image software designed for passport/ID photo format. The company was formerly known as Hi-Touch Imaging Technologies Co., Ltd. and changed its name to HiTi Digital, Inc. in 2007. HiTi Digital, Inc. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3499.TWO.summary: GlobalSat WorldCom Corporation manufactures and sells GPS receivers and module makers worldwide. It offers sports and outdoor products, such as Bike Computer, GPS Watch, Heart Rate Monitor, Triathlon Watch, and Wrist Band GPS cycling; and tracking devices, including asset tracker, AVL tracker, personal tracker, animal tracker. The company also provides IoT/M2M products comprising LoRaWAN devices, NB-loT Sigfox, LoRa M.O.S.T; accessories, which include GPS modules, GPS engine boards, GPS data loggers, wireless locators, and GPS active antennas. In addition, it provides customization services of electronic designs, system integration, and software development to meet the project requirements. The company's products are bundled into the clients' system products, such as tablet PCs, notebooks, and smartphones. It primarily exports its products to Europe and North America, as well as sells its products in other regions through channel distributors. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3511.TWO.summary: Simula Technology Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells connectors, cables, and accessories in Taiwan, China, Europe, the United States, Asia, and Europe. It offers audio and DC jacks; solutions for wearable devices, such as pogo pin and pad, magnetic pogo connections, and wireless charging magnets and coil modules; USB products; plugs, receptacles, and cable assemblies; fleet asset management interconnect solutions; and customized solutions. Its product applications include consumer electronics, fleet telematics, medical and healthcare, and industrial and outdoor applications. Simula Technology Inc. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3515.TW.summary: ASROCK Incorporation primarily manufactures and sells motherboards in Taiwan and internationally. It also offers graphics cards, networking products, mini and industrial PCs, and server/WS products. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3520.TWO.summary: Jhen Vei Electronic Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of a range of wires and cables. The company offers USB, DC, DP, DVI, VGA, audio, and RCA cables; and wire harness and internet safety products. Its products are used for transmitting power or signals on PC, notebook computers, tablets, smart phones, portable navigation devices, smart home devices, household appliances, vehicular equipment, industrial instrument, camcorders, TVs or stereos, speakers, and USB and other electronic devices. The company also provides network security services to communications, corporations, education, and gaming industries. Jhen Vei Electronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3521.TWO.summary: DataVan International Corporation provides POS solutions worldwide. The company offers POS terminals, embedded box PCs, touch monitors, touch systems, kiosks, and POS peripherals comprise cash drawers, thermal printers, and system attachments. It offers solutions for the retail and foodservice industries. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3523.TWO.summary: EFUN Technology Co.,Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells various optical products in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include quantum- dot films, high-brightness 2D/3D home projection screens, ITO transparent conductive films, surface structure diffusion films, anti-fog films, anti-blue light films, anti- electromagnetic interference films, anti-reflective films, water blocking films, non-conductive vacuum metallization coatings, screen protectors, and nano silver antibacterial films, as well as anti-bacterial, anti-splash, and anti-epidemic protective gears. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

3526.TWO.summary: As of February 26, 2021,  operates as a subsidiary of Pan Jit International Inc.

3527.TWO.summary: Macroblock, Inc. supplies LED drivers for display, backlighting, and lighting applications worldwide. The company's products include display, local dimming backlight, RGB lighting, automotive lighting and display, DC/DC controller and DC/DC convertor, isolated and non-isolated AC/DC controller, and linear regulator LED driver ICs. It also provides Hawkeye solution platform, a LED display solution; and micro-LED solutions. In addition, the company offers IOT technology solutions, including facial recognition, business intelligence analytics, and content management system solutions for the shopping mall, retail, and supermarket sectors. Macroblock, Inc. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3528.TW.summary: Answer Technology Co., Ltd. provides analog, mixed-signal, and digital signal processing integrated circuits (IC) in Taiwan. It also provides USB3.0/3.1, PCIe bridge, and switch ICs; and fabless IC design services, as well as various reference design and technology background for supporting services. In addition, the company designs, manufactures, and ships discrete and embedded magnetoresistive RAM (MRAM) and spin-torque MRAM; and offers circuit protection components and antenna products for computing, communication, consumer electronics, and automotive electronics. Further, it provides optical communications product; broadcast test and measurement equipment; design and consultancy services to broadcast, professional A/V, and image processing companies; packaged infrared sensors used for gas detection, flame detection, and gensture/motion/presence detection; and FPGAs, SoCs, MPSoCs, and 3D ICs, as well as develops various silicon intellectual properties and integrated technologies of system software/hardware. Additionally, the company offers sensor solutions for applications in various industries; Valens HDBaseT technology that provides plug-and-play digital connectivity between HD video sources and remote displays; and design services, and original IP core and application specific solutions, as well as develops ASSPs for motion control of fractional horse power stepper motors and brushless DC motors. Answer Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3529.TWO.summary: eMemory Technology Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells flash memory integrated circuits. It offers NeoBit, a programmable logic device that embeds into various CMOS processes, including logic, mixed-mode, bipolar-CMOS-DMOS (BCD), analog, radio frequency (RF), and high-voltage (HV); and NeoFuse, a small-form-factor logic non-volatile memory technology for use in IDs, production record, encryption code, and ROM replacement, as well as analog trimming, function selection, and parameter setting applications. It also used in set-top boxes, digital TV, CMOS imaging sensors, application processors, baseband processors, LCD drivers, and power management ICs. The company also provides NeoEE, a single-poly embedded memory device for application in users preference setting in IC cards, code storage in MCUs and RFICs, configuration settings in NFC controllers, fuse devices in memory redundancy designs, and parameter trimming for analog/RF/HV/BCD circuits; and NeoMTP, a single-poly embedded memory technology for USB type-C, wireless charger, touch panels, P-Gamma, MCUs, etc. In addition, it offers NeoPUF, a hardware security technology device for Internet of Things (IoT) applications; EcoBit, an embedded logic multiple-time programmable solution for passive RFID tags, lower power sensors, battery-saving mobile ICs, and other IoT chips; Green platform for code storage in microcontrollers or speech ICs; and MagnaChip EEPROM, an IP block device for code storage in microcontrollers, and RFICs, parameter trimming for analog/RF/HV circuits. It serves semiconductor foundries, integrated devices manufacturers, and fabless design houses in Taiwan and internationally. eMemory Technology Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

3530.TW.summary: Silicon Optronics, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a complementary metal-oxide-semiconductor image sensor design company in Taiwan, Hong Kong, the United States, India, Korea, and the Philippines. The company offers area sensors, including raw or SOC sensors for applications in smart phones and tablets, PC cams and Webcams, digital still cameras, and security and surveillance systems; and linear sensors for use in document scanners, multifunction printers, barcode scanners, fax machines, counterfeit money scanners, and portable scanners. It also engages in the investment business. Silicon Optronics, Inc. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3531.TWO.summary: Shian Yih Electronic Industry Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells light emitting diode (LED) back light modules. It provides small to medium size LED back light modules, motorcycle and vehicle LED headlight modules, light guide films, and plastic injection molding products, as well as LED packaging, design, and fabrication services. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

3532.TW.summary: Formosa Sumco Technology Corporation manufactures, sells, and trades in primarily in Taiwan. It offers polished, annealed, epitaxial, and test wafers. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Yunlin, Taiwan. Formosa Sumco Technology Corporation is a subsidiary of Sumco Techxiv Corporation.

3533.TW.summary: Lotes Co., Ltd designs, manufactures, and sells connectors and CPU sockets for notebook and personal computers, mobile electronic devices, etc. under the LOTES brand in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company's products include slot/edge card connectors; I/O series connectors, such as SlimSAS, OcuLink, optical fiber connectors, audio jack, RJ45, display port, HDMI, SATA/SAS, USB, Gen Z connectors, and sim card connectors; USB, fan, wire harness, DC and other cables; and battery connectors and holders. It also offers automotive connectors; and other products comprising of RF, BTB, FPC, and power connectors, as well as SPI sockets. In addition, the company researches and develops, and manages electronic components and assemblies, calculator parts, molds, plastic raw materials, industrial robots, intelligent floor sweeping robots and components, and industrial cameras, as well as import and export of goods and technologies; provides electrical and audio -visual electronic products; and develops and produces optical communication measuring instruments and optical transceivers, and related technical services. Further, it engages in property development, home rental, landscaping, and interior decoration activities; reinvestment activities; and offers surface treatment for various hardware and plastic products. Lotes Co., Ltd was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Keelung, Taiwan.

3535.TW.summary: Favite Inc. engages in the research, development, and manufacture of automatic optical detection and testing equipment. It offers panel display detection devices, semiconductor inspection equipment, PCB detection devices, automatic defect classification determination systems, and rate management systems for OLED displays, touch panels, cameras, and chromicity/film thickness/OD products, as well as automatic optical CD measurement equipment. Favite Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

3536.TW.summary: Sintronic Technology Inc. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of precision ceramics and UVC sterilization products worldwide. The company offers life medical products, such as medical face masks; UVC products, including sterilization tumblers, UVC LED water sterilizers, and UVC mini sterilizers; and precision ceramics for material applications. It serves customers in opto-electronics industry. The company was formerly known as MIT Advanced Technology Inc. and changed its name to Sintronic Technology Inc. in November 2004. Sintronic Technology Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3540.TWO.summary: Thermaltake Technology Co., Ltd. provides entertainment, e-sports, technology, and lifestyle products worldwide. It offers cases, power supplies, and coolers under the Thermaltake brand; keyboards, headsets, mice, and accessories under the Tt eSPORTS brand name; and mobile accessories under the LUXA2 brand. The company also operates an e-shopping site under the Tt Buy brand name. It serves its customers through distributors and retailers. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3541.TWO.summary: Cypress Technology Co.,Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells AV and multimedia products. The company provides matrixes, splitters, switchers, extenders, scalers, video and audio products, control systems, and other products. Its products are primarily designed for signal management for home theater integration, AV signal distribution within mega stores, video production, video picture enhancement or signal format conversion, distribution, and switching. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3543.TW.summary: Jochu Technology Co., Ltd. primarily develops and manufactures optronics metal components in Taiwan and internationally. It offers metal bezels and metal back covers. The company also undertakes metal works of household furniture; and provides assistive devices of movement for elderly and disabilities, exoskeletons for heavy workload personnel, and household health care products. Jochu Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3545.TW.summary: FocalTech Systems Co., Ltd. provides LCD display driver solutions worldwide. The company offers IDC, fingerprint identification, display driver, and touch chips. It also provides human-machine interface solutions, including 2D/3D touch controller, super in- cell IDC, fingerprint sensor, and display driver for smart electronic devices. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3548.TWO.summary: Jarllytec Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells various hinges in Taiwan, China, the United States, Thailand, and internationally. It offers hinges for NB, LCD, LCD TVs, cell phones, PDAs, office equipment, in-car handheld type products, 3C products, medical equipment, fiber optic connectors, fiber optic patchcords, RF connectors, fiber optic splitters, fiber optic attenuators, fiber optic terminators, and couplers/WDMs, as well as metal injection/MIM. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3551.TWO.summary: Shih Her Technologies Inc. provides precision clean and reborn treatment for semiconductor, photoelectricity, and solar energy's manufacturing equipment parts. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3555.TWO.summary: iROC Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, and sale of natural products in Japan. The company offers drinking water under the VACHI; skin care products under the QINGSKIN; and chicken essence under the DDDrops brand names. It serves customers through online shops and distributors. The company was formerly known as Skymedi Corporation. iROC Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3556.TWO.summary: eGalax_eMPIA Technology Inc. provides touch panel solutions. The company offers projected capacitive IC and controller solutions, resistive touch solutions, surface capacitive touch controllers, surface acoustic wave touch sensors and controllers, and accessories. It serves the industrial, commercial, gaming, medical, banking, military, transportation, and consumer electronic sectors. eGalax_eMPIA Technology Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3558.TWO.summary: Senao Networks, Inc. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells wireless communication products in the United States, Europe, Taiwan, and internationally. The company offers wireless network Wi-Fi systems, including outdoor mesh wireless access points (APs)/repeaters, user-end mesh wireless APs/bridges, smart cloud network management services, smart mesh connection solutions, wireless network routers, smart home mesh wireless network routers, and enterprise wireless network management software. It also provides wired network system switches, such as large enterprises network security servers, small and medium-sized enterprises network security servers, medium and large-sized enterprises network security servers, managed network switches, managed network controllers, easy/smart network switches, layer2/3 managed network switches, PoE network cable power supplies, and electrical equipment for smart power supply. In addition, the company offers cloud management service and cloud device management platforms, cloud management service wireless network base stations, and cloud management service switches; enterprise radio system products comprising single-wire, high-speed, frequency-hopping, digital, and long-range enterprise cordless communication devices; and four-wire, multi-master, high-speed, frequency-hopping, digital, and long-range enterprise cordless communication systems, as well as AP CAMs, PoE/Ethernet power supply parts, antennas, and power supply products. Further, it is involved in the development of new generation of 6GHz wireless management base stations; cloud gateways; enterprise-grade video surveillance solution; Internet of Things/Industrial Internet of Things; outdoor wireless LTE bridge APs; IP-base long-range cordless phones; and integrated 900MHz digital cordless interphones. The company offers products under the Senao and EnGenius names. Senao Networks, Inc. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3563.TW.summary: Machvision Inc. develops and sells machine vision systems for semiconductor and printed circuit board (PCB) industry in Taiwan. The company provides drilling and routing measuring series products, including Hole-AOI systems that measure the position, diameter, and roughness of a drilled hole; and EZ3D system, which is designed to perform automatic and accurate dimensional measuring systems. It also offers IC substrate, HDI, and FPCB inspection and measuring series products, such as 3D AOI systems, solid measuring viewers, and LaserVia AOIM inspection systems; AFI, FPCB AVI, and Wafer AVI inspecting systems; and CSPAFI integrating AOI+AVI algorithm and fast-capturing-multi-illumination optical systems. In addition, the company provides wiring inspection series, which includes circuit AOI system for PCB/FPC, verification, and repair; ArtWork AOI products; and LineGauge systems for use in optical measurements and QC reporting applications. Machvision Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3564.TWO.summary: AEWIN Technologies Co.,Ltd. provides network platform products and solutions in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers network appliances; general purpose and edge computing servers, and workstation products; network expansion modules; and other modules, as well as provides ODM/OEM services. Its products are used for network computing, software-defined wide area network, network functions virtualization infrastructure, multi-access edge computing/edge AI, and 5G/vRAN applications. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3567.TWO.summary: ETREND Hightech Corp. engages in testing and processing electronic components in Taiwan. It offers IC and wafer testing services. The company is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3570.TWO.summary: Otsuka Information Technology Corp. agency sales of 3D computer engineering drawing CAID/CAD/CAM/CAE/PDM design software, system application consulting, online guidance, talent training, and other services in Taiwan and China. The company develops HyperPDM, a product information management system; and information security system integration applications that protect design, research, and development data. It serves manufacturing, construction, media and entertainment, information security/cloud/big data/AI industries. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Otsuka Information Technology Corp. is a subsidiary of Otsuka Corporation.

3581.TWO.summary: Zen Voce Corporation manufactures and sells optoelectronic and semiconductor dicing saws, and assembly and testing products. It engages in the design and manufacture of IC packaging machine and bumping; wafer cutting and cleaning machines; and board cutting and cleaning machines. The company also designs and manufactures test products, such as wafer test probe card PCBs; IC test HIFIX and CHANG kits; SOCKET IC test products; IC handlers; and SOCKET IC burn-in test products, as well as offers dicing and jig saws, tapes, and ball mount tooling products. It serves semiconductors, optoelectronics, microelectronics, and LCD equipment industries. The company was formerly known as Trutek Cooperation. Zen Voce Corporation was founded in 1999 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3583.TW.summary: Scientech Corporation supplies products and services for the semiconductor, flat panel display, LED, data storage, scientific instruments, and high-tech related industries. The company offers chemical analysis and biotechnology equipment; remote control system; camera lens; flat panel display; mask/reticle and semiconductor front-end process equipment; MEMS/compound semiconductor/LED products; semiconductor packaging and testing equipment; 3D printing equipment; and wet benches/single wafer wet process equipment, and temporary bonding/de-bonding/glass recycle tools. It also provides wafer reclaiming services; repair, overhaul, and calibration services; and used tools, such as refurbished metrology, Nikon stepper/scanner, TEL track, and ion implanter tools. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3587.TWO.summary: Materials Analysis Technology Inc. provides laboratory services in the areas of materials analysis, failure analysis, and reliability testing in Taiwan, China, Japan, Singapore, Malaysia, and internationally. The company offers reliability, non-destructive, electrical failure, materials, surface, and total solutions, as well as circuit edit and sample preparation solutions. Its products are used for various applications in IC, LED, biological and Nano, solar cell, and other industries. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3588.TW.summary: Leadtrend Technology Corporation operates as an IC fables company primarily in Taiwan. It offers AC-DC controllers, such as primary side regulator controllers, isolated green mode products, isolated high voltage green mode products, synchronous rectification drivers, and transition mode PFC controllers; USB type-c port controllers; and LED application products, including 3 in 1 flexible dimming processors, AC/DC LED lighting controllers/drivers, current ripple suppressors, and CC/CV secondary side controllers. The company also provides TV/monitor, USB PD/PPS, networking, and LED lighting solutions. Its products are used in technical articles, networking, notebooks, monitors/TVs, chargers, and LED lightings. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3592.TWO.summary: Raydium Semiconductor Corporation provides integrated circuit (IC) solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers driver IC, power IC, touch control IC, and power management and timing controller IC solutions for artificial intelligence, Internet of Things, smart TVs, professional gaming, computer information, automotive, and industrial control products, as well as mobile and wearable devices. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3593.TW.summary: Logah Technology Corp. engages in the design, development, and manufacture of professional precision molds, precision plastic parts forming, spraying, printing, hot-melting, automatic pinning, electroplating, and assembly products in Taiwan. The company also offers two-color, nitrogen, in-mold, RHCM cold and hot high-gloss molding products. In addition, it provides plastic shell products, such as household appliances, outdoor sports equipment, LCD TVs, AIO computers, electroacoustic, Netcom, power supplies, car materials, etc.; and automotive interior and energy parts, speakers, tablets, vacuum cleaners, mobile phones, headphones, chargers, and power banks. Logah Technology Corp. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

3596.TW.summary: Arcadyan Technology Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of wireless networking products, integrated access devices, digital home multimedia devices, and mobile broadband products worldwide. It operates in Networking Product and Digital Set-Top Box Product segments. The company provides various broadband access and digital home solutions, such as DSL CPEs, 802.11a/b/g/n client solutions, Wi-Fi modules, FTTx solutions, mobile broadband products, IP set-top boxes, power line communication products, etc. It also offers broadband/wireless/multimedia products for specialized design-in requirements, as well as add-on products to enhance products with wireless convenience. The company provides its solutions to telecom operators, ISPs, retailers, consumer electronic companies, and OEMs/ODMs. Arcadyan Technology Corporation was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3597.TWO.summary: Avertronics Inc. engages in the contract manufacturing of connectors and wire-harnesses in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides automotive wire harness modules, cables, and connectors; e-bike/e-scooter battery connectors; and renewable energy solutions, such as solar energy generator and storage products, and mobile solar lighting tower. It also offers fitness and flywheel wire harnesses, as well as electric scooter for seniors; and board to board modules, high power/high current wire harnesses, PCBA modules, sensor and protecting components, and breakers. In addition, the company provides SST temperature and automobile sensors, as well as electricity breaker for the robotics industry and Internet of Things. Avertronics Inc. was founded in 1986 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

3605.TW.summary: ACES Electronics Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells electronic connectors Taiwan and internationally. It offers board to board, wire-to-board, FFC/FPC, card, pin header, mini and micro luck, RJ, power, SATA, SlimSAS, universal serial bus (USB), and USB type C connectors. The company also provides battery and high definition multimedia interface connectors; DC power jacks; and camera modules, device and harness, and EV products. Its products are used various applications, such as transportation, telecom/datacom, computer and peripherals, industrial, medical, smart home appliances, cloud computing and server, automotive, and consumer electronics. ACES Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3615.TWO.summary: AimCore Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a sputtering company in Taiwan and internationally. It offers touch panel ITO glass, TN/STN LCD ITO glass, black matrix glass, and color filter top ITO glass for applications in LCD panels, touch panels, and organic ELD panels. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3622.TW.summary: Young Fast Optoelectronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells touch panel sensor products in Taiwan and internationally. It provides resistive touch panels, which are used for various applications, such as mobile phones, PDAs, and GPS navigation devices; and flat-surface touch panels for next-generation smart phones and high-end mobile devices. The company also offers capacitive touch panels for high-end cellular phones, smart phones, mobile appliances, digital cameras, car navigation systems, and other consumer electronic devices, as well as industrial control touch panels and touch screen monitors. It provides support and services comprising preliminary feasibility evaluation, market channel planning, engineering drafting, cost estimation, and mass production scheduling. The company was formerly known as The Optoelectronics Division and changed its name to Young Fast Optoelectronics Co., Ltd. in January 2000. Young Fast Optoelectronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3623.TWO.summary: Transtouch Technology Inc. produces and sells touch panels in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers 4-wires and 5-wires resistive touch panels, multi-point resistive touch panels and capacitive touch panels. Its products are used in HMI and multifunction printers; POS and ATMs; military and aviation; automotive industry; medical and marine applications; and gaming devices. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3627.TWO.summary: Arima Lasers Corporation manufactures and sells laser diodes in Taiwan. The company's products are used in various applications, including optical disk drives, optical communication networks, laser mouse, laser display, photodynamic therapy, laser printers, bar code scanners, distance measurements, levelers, etc. It also offers laser modules; high power products; surface mount device of laser diode; and OEM services, such as die bonding, in process quality check, wire bonding, cap sealing, auto laser marking, and testing services. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3630.TWO.summary: Newmax Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, sale, and design of photographic/optical equipment, electronic parts/components, and electrical machinery/supplies in China, Taiwan, Japan, and Vietnam. It manufactures and sells optics mirror and plastic lens to optical equipment manufacturers and computer peripheral digital imaging manufacturers. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

3632.TWO.summary: Papago Inc. produces and sells vehicle communication devices in Taiwan and internationally. It offers driving recorders; GPS satellite navigation products, such as handheld navigation, car navigation, and car mounted android machine products; electronic rearview mirrors; wireless tire pressure detectors; electronic signage; smart life products; and face recognition solutions. The company offers its products online, as well as through retail stores. Papago Inc. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3633.TWO.summary: Epoch Chemtronics Corp. manufactures and sells backlight modules in Taiwan. It offers LED products, including panel, down, integrated, task, shelf, and art panel lights. The company's products are used in a range of applications, such as GPS, smart phones, tablets, and industrial computers. It markets and sells its products under the Epoch Lighting brand name. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3645.TW.summary: Taimide Tech. Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of polyimide films (PI) in Taiwan and China. The company provides a range of polyimide films for use in flexible printed circuit boards (FPCB), coverlays, stiffeners, composited PIs, 3L FCCLs, general industry, heat-resistant tapes, pressure sensitive tapes, rigid-flex PCBs, flexible displays, flexible electronics, LED light bars, barcodes, etc. Taimide Tech. Inc. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3652.TWO.summary: Unitech Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automatic identification and data capture technologies worldwide. It provides mobile computer products, such as rugged smartphones, touch computers, industrial PDAs, handheld terminals, enterprise tablets, healthcare mobile computers, wearable computers, touch computers, and mobile clinical assistant; barcode scanners that include linear imager, 2D imager, laser, wireless, pocket, ESD safe, healthcare, and wearable scanners, as well as pen and slot readers; and RFID products, such as reader modules, mobile readers, handheld readers, fixed readers, portable/pocket readers, and antennas. The company also offers intelligent integrated terminals that include IP based biometric terminal; and software solutions, such as MoboLink, a device and data exchange management software, as well as StageGO solutions, a barcode-based device staging solution. It serves its customers in the fields of retail, field services, governments, healthcare, hospitality, logistics and transportation, warehousing, and manufacturing. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Unitech Electronics Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Unitech Computer Co., Ltd.

3653.TW.summary: Jentech Precision Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision metal stampings, insert and injection moldings, and machining and assembly solution worldwide. The company's principal products include thermal heat spreaders, Semiconductor Leadframes, SMD LED Leadframes, EMI sheilding cases, RF coaxial connectors, TV tuner metal chassis, HDD and floppy drive components, and DPC thin-film ceramic substrate components. Its products are used in medical, consumer electronics, semiconductor, automotive, appliance, microelectronic, and other industries. Jentech Precision Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3659.TWO.summary: Bison Electronics Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of camera modules and computer peripheral related products in Taiwan. Its products are used in imaging products, such as video camera modules for notebook computers, industrial handheld display products, home care, automotive image related products, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3661.TW.summary: Alchip Technologies, Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides silicon design and manufacturing solutions for application specific integrated circuit and System on chip (SoC) companies. It offers SoC design, production, and IP solutions, as well as multi project wafer services. The company's products are primarily used in network, storage, and computing devices; HDTVs, mobile phones, digital cameras/video cameras, entertainment systems, portable media players, tablet PC master chips, and peripheral chips; and surveillance systems, entertainment machines, and medical equipment and instruments. It operates in China, Japan, the United States, Taiwan, Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3665.TW.summary: Bizlink Holding Inc. researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells various technological products and components for various technology industries in the United States, China, Germany and internationally. It operates through Computer Related Products, Fiber Optics, Home Appliances, and Others segments. The company provides adapters, high-speed cables, power whips and cables, connectors, modules, hubs and docks, and dongles; and cable storage, integration of electrical and mechanical parts, and over molding of fixings and mountings for cable harnesses, textile braided cable for harness systems, complex wire harnesses, and systems and customized solutions, as well as power cords, wire harness, and wires and cables. It also offers towline, micro coaxial, photoelectric hybrid, drag chain, phase, defibrillation, and USB extender cables, as well as optical fiber patchcord, thermistor detector, and medical raw wire for medical equipment; and transceivers, ultra-compact and high isolation WDM, coupler/PLC, optical switch/VOA, circulator/isolator/hybrid, high density module, and HDMI/DP/USB optical cables for optical fiber communications. In addition, the company provides cables for automation and semiconductor equipment, and subway projects, as well as wire harnesses for oil and gas equipment, and passenger aviation; and solar energy connectivity solutions, including junction boxes, DC branch cables, connectors, and PV cables. Further, it provides battery management system and TVSH harnesses, charging systems and accessories, main harnesses, and automotive wires. Additionally, it engages in the wholesale and retail of cable assemblies, power cords, and connectors, as well as computer peripheral products, electronic materials, fiber optical passive components, and fiber optical cables; and produces and sells fiberfill moldings, smart instrumentational sensors, connectors, and functional materials. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3666.TWO.summary: Optivision Technology, Inc. designs and develops optical films in Taiwan. The company offers components of the backlight modules. Its products are used in LCD backlight modules of various sizes, such as TVs, VCDs, players, projectors, etc.; notebooks, monitors, digital cameras, PDAs, tablets, and other products; mobile phones, car navigation products, etc.; electronic watches, calculators, etc.; and industrial, medical, flight, and other instruments. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3673.TW.summary: TPK Holding Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, designs, develops, and markets touch solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers various types of structure products, such as glass-glass and glass-film-film, as well as single glass solution, including one glass, touch-on-lens, glass-films, etc. The company's products are used in various mobile and consumer electronics devices, such as smartphones, tablet PCs, notebook PCs, ultrabook PCs, and electronic book readers. It also provides touch panel (TP) solutions for other product domains, including gambling systems, industrial control systems, medical products, handheld game consoles, and touch remote controls. The company's products are used in various businesses, such as retailing, service, banking, airport service, game consoles, display systems, and auto industries. TPK Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3675.TWO.summary: Eris Technology Corporation manufactures, tests, and sells rectifier diodes, wafers, and light-emitting diodes in Taiwan, Asia, Europe, and the United States. The company offers a range of diodes, including schottky barrier, hyper fast, fast and super-fast recovery, high efficiency, general purpose, ultra-fast, and bridge rectifiers; and diodes for solar modules, transient voltage suppressors, zener diodes, current regulative diodes, small signal diodes, and ESD protection devices. It also provides soldering pads; and manufacturing services for various products using different manufacturing modes. In addition, the company wholesales electronic components. Its products have applications in networking products, LED lamps, solar junction boxes, LED drivers, smart phone chargers, automotive products, USBs, power supply products, and lithium batteries. The company offers its products primarily to original equipment companies. Eris Technology Corporation was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Eris Technology Corporation is a subsidiary of Diodes Incorporated.

3679.TW.summary: Nishoku Technology Inc. designs and manufactures single and double steel plastic injection molds in Taiwan, the United States, rest of Asia, Europe, and internationally. The company offers single injection molding products, such as display cases, VR glass, IPAD cover, overhead console, side mirror direction light, auto interior light, car handle, and walkie-talkie. It also provides double injection molding products, including wireless Bluetooth speakers, function key, control console, and phone keypad. In addition, the company offers tooling products and electronic parts. It serves consumer, computer, auto, and communication sectors. Nishoku Technology Inc. was founded in 1980 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3680.TWO.summary: Gudeng Precision Industrial Co., Ltd provides technology services worldwide. The company offers mask handling solutions, such as ultraviolet reticle POD, reticle SMIF POD, and mask package; and wafer handling solutions, including front opening unified POD, multi-application carriers, FOUP, wafer cassettes, shipping boxes, and cassette boxes. It also provides equipment comprising mask cleaners and purge stations; and cleaning services, mask management and tracking systems, and mask accessories. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3685.TWO.summary: Tradetool Auto Co., Ltd. develops and sells automotive optics, metal stamping, and welding parts in Taiwan. The company offers automotive metal parts, such as metal parts stamping, metal component welding, and stamping die products. It also provides automotive optics parts, including display optical injection component; LED headlight lens and lens core; and head up displays (HUD) comprising HUD freeform mirror injection and coating, HUD freeform mirrors, HUD combiners, and VR lens. The company was formerly known as Jeng Shiang Precision Ind. Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tradetool Auto Co., Ltd. in May 2016. Tradetool Auto Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.

3686.TW.summary: Danen Technology Corporation manufactures and sells solar ingots and wafers for photovoltaic applications worldwide. The company provides multi-crystalline solar wafers, ingots, and bricks; and customized OEM services. It serves solar cell companies. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3688.TWO.summary: HLJ Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells photoelectric semiconductors. The company offers epitaxial wafer, optical communication, light-sensor, and lighting products for proximity sensor, high-speed optical fiber communication, gesture recognition, optical sensor, laser monitor, time of flight, long distance night vision surveillance system, and optical communication applications. It also provides foundry and design services. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3689.TWO.summary: U.D. Electronic Corp. manufactures and sells electronic components worldwide. Its products include RJ45 ICM connectors, pure connectors, LAN filters, and I/O connectors, consumer cables, surge protection devices, audio modules and dongles, and USB to RJ45 dongles, as well as automotive electronics, such as common mode filters and USB connectors. The company offers its products under the UDEJack trademark for the telecommunications, data communications, computer, industrial, and medical markets. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3694.TW.summary: AzureWave Technologies, Inc. manufactures and sells wireless connectivity and image processing solutions worldwide. The company offers wireless modules, including M.2 socket type, M.2 solder own, solder down stamp, wireless IOT module, and system in package products. It also provides camera modules, such as USB interface, MIPI interface, ultra slim and narrow NB, ultra slim and narrow MIPI, and biological identification/depth detection camera modules. In addition, the company offers design, manufacturing, and software services. Its products have applications in personal and industrial computers, mobile and internet devices, consumer electronics, home appliances, automotive components, manufacturing facilities, and others. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3702.TW.summary: WPG Holdings Limited distributes semiconductor, electronic, and electrical components in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company provides core components, such as chipsets, graphics/audio/video controllers, smartphone chips, network/modem chipsets, CPU/MPU, RISC CPU, etc.; analog IC and mixed signal components, including bipolar, CMOS operational amplifiers, comparators, digital/analog converters, power supply controllers, audio and video amplifiers or controllers, etc.; and discrete logic IC components comprising of diodes, rectifiers, transistors, thyristors, insulated-gate bipolar transistors, optical transistors, logic ICs, etc. It also offers memory components, such as DRAM, SRAM, EPROM, EEPROM, flash, MCP, etc.; optical components, which includes LCD, sensor, LED, etc.; and passive components, connectors, and magnetic components, including resistors, capacitors, inductors, magnetic components, cables, connectors, mechanics, electro mechanics, circuit protection, materials, batteries, filters, oscillators, etc., as well as non-electronic components. In addition, the company operates children theme parks; and engages in the investment activities and general trading business. Further, it offers various value-added services, such as special delivery, market information, technical support and tools, financial support, turnkey solution, warehousing, logistics, and e-commerce services; and computer software, computer and its peripherals, and information products. WPG Holdings Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3702A.TW.summary: WPG Holdings Limited distributes semiconductor, electronic, and electrical components in Taiwan, Mainland China, and internationally. The company provides core components, such as chipsets, graphics/audio/video controllers, smartphone chips, network/modem chipsets, CPU/MPU, RISC CPU, etc.; analog IC and mixed signal components, including bipolar, CMOS operational amplifiers, comparators, digital/analog converters, power supply controllers, audio and video amplifiers or controllers, etc.; and discrete logic IC components comprising of diodes, rectifiers, transistors, thyristors, insulated-gate bipolar transistors, optical transistors, logic ICs, etc. It also offers memory components, such as DRAM, SRAM, EPROM, EEPROM, flash, MCP, etc.; optical components, which includes LCD, sensor, LED, etc.; and passive components, connectors, and magnetic components, including resistors, capacitors, inductors, magnetic components, cables, connectors, mechanics, electro mechanics, circuit protection, materials, batteries, filters, oscillators, etc., as well as non-electronic components. In addition, the company operates children theme parks; and engages in the investment activities and general trading business. Further, it offers various value-added services, such as special delivery, market information, technical support and tools, financial support, turnkey solution, warehousing, logistics, and e-commerce services; and computer software, computer and its peripherals, and information products. WPG Holdings Limited was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3704.TW.summary: Unizyx Holding Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides networking solutions for telecom operators, corporates, and home users worldwide. It offers consumer devices, remote central office equipment, wired and wireless equipment, and home and cloud equipment under the Zyxel brand and MitraStar names. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3706.TW.summary: MiTAC Holdings Corporation, through its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and sells computers and ancillary equipment, and communication related products. The company offers computer frames, motherboards, interface cards, displays, power supplies, keyboards, and related metal stamping and plastic parts, as well as provides maintenance services for motherboards. It is also involved in the research, development, and manufacture of computer software, and provision of related technical advisory services; and research and development of calculators, servers, mobile phones, and PDA and GPS products, as well as provision of technical transfer and advisory services. In addition, the company sells electronic telecommunication products, and communication and software products, as well as offers related after-sale services; and assembles and sells computer peripherals, hardware/software, and related products. Further, it engages in the testing, maintenance, and display of computers, computer components, communication products, and consumer electronic products, as well as provision of related technical advisory and after-sale services; and general investment activities. Additionally, the company offers freight transport agency, export and import trading, and warehousing services; customer data processing, analysis, and integrated services; and business administration services. It operates in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, and internationally. MiTAC Holdings Corporation was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3707.TWO.summary: Episil Holding Inc. engages in the epitaxial wafer foundry, power semiconductor, and analog integrated circuit businesses in Taiwan. The company was formerly known as Episil Technologies Inc. Episil Holding Inc. was founded in 1985 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3710.TWO.summary: ACON Holding Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells electronic components for IT, digital home applications, handheld devices, etc. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3714.TW.summary: ENNOSTAR Inc. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of compound semiconductors in Taiwan. The company's products include epitaxial and chip, package and modules, and special compound semiconductors. Its products are used in displays, professional lighting, automotive, and sensing applications. The company was formerly known as EPISTAR Corporation. ENNOSTAR Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

4527.TWO.long_name: Kuen Ling Machinery Refrigerating Co., Ltd.
4527.TWO.summary: Kuen Ling Machinery Refrigerating Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells ice water mainframes and air-conditioning equipment in Taiwan and internationally. Its products include water cooled and air-cooled ice water, computer room box, hot and cold water, and condenser automatic cleaning machines; ice storage tanks; vacuum dryers; refrigeration and open screw compressor units; cooling fans and direct expansion air conditioners; and direct expansion inverter air conditioning units; and ice water cooler and condensers. The company also offers OEM and ODM services for air-conditioning equipment manufacturers. Its products are used in office buildings, commercial buildings, hospitals, and schools. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4549.TWO.summary: FineTek Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells process automation, flow metering, wireless communication technology, and tank gauging systems in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers liquid and solid point switches; liquid and solid level transmitters; flow measurement switches and transmitters; pressure level transmitters and switches; temperature transmitters and thermocouples; and grain monitoring systems, including temperature and level monitoring transmitters, multi-point temperature sensors, materials management systems, and remote control units. It also provides wireless products, such as hublinks, coordinators, routers, and end devices; pneumatic products comprising air hammers, pneumatic vibrators, diaphragm valves, dust collector systems, and air pads; safety products, such as isolated safety barriers, speed monitors, conveyer belt misalignment switches, and safety cable pull switches. In addition, the company offers digital controllers/digital meters consisting of digital display panel meters and temperature controllers. Its products and solutions are used in various industries, including cement, hydraulic, petrochemical, food and beverage, chemical, water and wastewater treatment, electronics, power generation, construction, maritime, and steel industries. FineTek Co., Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4555.TW.summary: TAIWAN CHELIC Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pneumatic and electric actuator automation components in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides air source units; control valves; miniature, standard, stopper, dual rod, compact, slide table, guide, rod less, clamp, and rotary cylinders; grippers; vacuum equipment; and fitting/auxiliary equipment. It also offers accessories for pressure switches and sensing components. The company's products are used in production facilities, inspection machines, packing machines, forming machines, repairmen equipment, and factory automation applications. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4582.TWO.summary: Hengs Technology Co., Ltd. provides solar monitoring system integration and related products in Taiwan. The company's design products include solar pumps, RSK systems, off-grid solar power system kits, solar outdoor lightings, and solar mounting racks; and distributed products comprise PV modules, charge controllers, inverters, batteries, solar surge arresters, and wind turbines. It also markets related solar power products, as well as markets and services industry and precision instruments; and offers warranty services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.

4609.TWO.summary: Airlux Electrical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells electrical appliances in China and internationally. The company offers stand mixers, table blenders, hand blenders, cooking machines, and juice extractors, as well as electric blankets and food processors. Airlux Electrical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

4760.TWO.summary: Ample Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd. produces and sells thick-film conductors in Taiwan. It offers pastes for terminal and internal electrodes of passive components, copper and silver paste products, and solar cells; and conductive silver pastes for touch panels, membrane switches, and LED and IC packages. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

4905.TWO.summary: Tainet Communication System Corp. provides carrier class access equipment to telecom carriers, service operators, and business users worldwide. The company offers Ethernet access devices, VoIP gateway products, xDSL and analog modems, PON, optical transceivers, and interface converters. It also provides copper over fiber connectivity, VoIP gateway communication, xDSL Ethernet, and TDM over IP communication solutions. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4906.TW.summary: Gemtek Technology Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells wireless communications technologies and solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers wireless broadband products, including LTE portable routing products, indoor and outdoor routers, and micro base stations for individuals and families, as well as enterprises, factories, and other applications; and fixed broadband products, such as PON, xDSL/G.fast broadband, and DPU broadband hybrid fiber/copper wire distribution point unit products. The company also provides connected smart home products comprising full coverage seamless connection systems, ViTA smart controllers, and smart sensors; LoRa Internet of Things technologies and communication protocols; and joint design and manufacturing, as well as contract manufacturing services. In addition, it offers intelligent wireless system and vertical integration, smart vertical integration, LTE micro base station, and Internet of Things connection protocol solutions. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

4915.TW.summary: Primax Electronics Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells mobile device components, computer peripherals, business equipment, and digital home products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers mobile device components, such as camera and fingerprint modules, solutions for wireless charging, ultra-thin keyboard modules, and mobile camera systems; Bluetooth communications devices, such as Bluetooth headphones, audio transmitters, hands-free car headsets, identification card headphones, image viewers, digital pens, GPS receivers, etc.; and mobile device accessories comprising charging cradles, data cables, car chargers, hands-free car accessories, etc. It also provides PC peripherals, including computer input devices, gaming peripherals, ultra-thin Bluetooth tablet keyboards, and digital writing tablets/stylus; and business equipment consisting of scanners, printers/multifunction printers, shredders, and laminators. In addition, the company offers digital home products, such as smart TV remote controls, wireless portable storage devices, and Internet music boxes; audio products; and product development services comprising usability test and industrial design. Primax Electronics Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4916.TW.summary: Parpro Corporation provides design and manufacturing services for processor based embedded solutions to original equipment manufacturers in Europe and the United States. It offers switching platforms, multi-core processor cards and blades; embedded hardware system design services; schematic capture and PCB layout design services for hardware development solutions; mechanical design services; and firmware design services. The company also provides wire harness and cable assembly; sheet metal fabrication and finishing; precision machining; subsystem assembly and integration; and box build, kiosk, and rack services. It serves customers in the aerospace, gaming, telecommunication, and industrial markets. The company was formerly known as Pilot Electronics Corporation. Parpro Corporation was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

4919.TW.summary: Nuvoton Technology Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a digital/analog/mixed signal semiconductor company in the United States, Europe, Asia, and internationally. It operates through General Integrated Circuit (IC) Product and Foundry Service segments. The company engages in the research, design, development, manufacture, and sale of logic ICs; and manufacture, testing, and OEM of 6-inch wafers. It also researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells microcontrollers; microprocessors; application specific SoCs devices; audio amplifiers, CODECs, converters, and enhancements; and ISD voice ICs, including ISD ChipCorder products and Voiceband CODECs. In addition, the company provides cloud computing products comprising embedded controllers, hardware monitors, I/O and security devices, iBMC products, and voltage level shifters; power management products, which consist of power switches and voltage regulators; and Internet of things (IoT) solutions. Further, it operates IoT for various IoT solutions; operates emWin platform for graphical user interface solution to create graphics for the embedded system; and offers professional semiconductor foundry services. Additionally, the company engages in the wholesale of computers, supplements, and software; and provides computer software services. Its products are used in automotive, computing, medical, portable devices, audio/video products, and consumer and industrial electronics, as well IoT security and smart home appliances. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan. Nuvoton Technology Corporation is a subsidiary of Winbond Electronics Corporation.

4923.TWO.summary: Force MOS Technology Co., LTD. engages in the design, development, and sale of MOSFETs and analog ICs in Taiwan. It offers bipolar transistors; diodes and rectifiers; and power management products for light electric vehicles technology and brushless DC motor control applications. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

4924.TWO.summary: HTM International Holding Ltd. engages in the production and sale of precision molds, computer notebook accessories, hi-fi systems accessories, office automation products, and home audio products and related parts. It offers PC components, including gas injection products; PC peripherals, such as portable hard disk covers and CD boxes; and speakers. The company also provides biomass energy products. It operates in Taiwan, Europe, the United States, Japan, and China. HTM International Holding Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

4925.TWO.summary: JMicron Technology Corp. operates as an IC design company in Taiwan and internationally. The company designs high-speed data and signal interfaces, such as 3.1 5Gbps, USB 3.2 10Gbps and USB 3.2 20Gbps to connect them to SATA/PCIe/UFS; PCIe interface to SATA interface; and SATA 1.5Gbps/SATA 3Gbps/SATA 6Gbps, and SATA port multiplier/port selector, as well as bridge controllers for SATA to PATA interface. It also provides external data storage products, such as single bay controllers for USB 2.0/USB 3.0/USB 3.1/USB 3.2 host interfaces; dual-/multi-bay bridge controllers for external multiple-bay HDDs, RAID, and SATA port multipliers and port selectors; storage device controllers; and universal flash storage products. In addition, the company offers hard disk drive duplicators and surveillance storage systems, and NAS devices with RAID functionality. JMicron Technology Corp. is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

4930.TW.summary: Star Comgistic Capital Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells household appliances in Taiwan and internationally. It offers green energy products; grills, including table top grills, Panini makers, baking centers, hot pots, steak grills, multi cookers, foldable griddles, and healthy grills; food preparation products, such as blenders, mixers, food processors, and juice extractors; and home comfort products comprising dehumudifiers, heaters, fans, and vacuum cleaners. The company also provides outdoor grills; microwave and oven products; beverage products consisting of pump espresso makers, coffee makers, kettles, steam mixers, and automatic espresso makers; and garment care products, including steam irons, boil station irons, garment steamers, and LCD electronic irons, as well as frying pans and skip toasters. In addition, it designs and manufactures molds, feed and process non-ferrous metal composite materials, and new alloy materials; sells raw materials, molds, machinery equipment, and components, as well as semi-finished products; and is involved in the import, export, and wholesale of various small household electrical appliances. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4933.TWO.summary: Ubright Optronics Corporation manufactures and sells optoelectronics LCD backlight module components for the display industry in Taiwan. It offers prism, multi function, and quantum dot films for backlight displays; polarizer protection and anti-glare films for LCD displays; 3D curve display protection films for OLED displays; anti-static protection, in process panel protection, hard coat, masking protection, and optical clear adhesive films for touch panels; anti-glare films for E paper products; and ceramic window films for windows. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan. Ubright Optronics Corporation is a subsidiary of Shinkong Synthetic Fibers Corporation.

4934.TW.summary: Tainergy Tech Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and markets solar cells in Taiwan. It offers solar energy application systems, including solar refrigerator, pumping, air conditioner, and deionized water systems; multi-crystalline and mono-crystalline silicon solar cells; solar modules with build in Li-NMC batteries; solar modules for briefcase, folding, flexible, and light weight solar panel applications; solar power storage systems; domestic back-up power systems, such as power unit, energy storage system, power walker, and portable power station; and solar power bricks. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4938.TW.summary: Pegatron Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in designing, manufacturing, and selling computer, communication, and consumer electronic products worldwide. It offers computing products, such as notebooks, desktops, PCs, motherboards, rugged computers, and servers; consumer electronics, including tablets and game consoles, wearable devices, smart home devices, and automotive electronics; and communication products, which include cable modems, set-top boxes, smartphones, switches, and routers. The company also provides car electronics, such as car entertainment products, vehicle telematics, and advanced driver assistance systems; and smart electronics, including Internet of Things products, drones, robots, and virtual reality products.
